Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-11053 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-15, affected by CVE-2024-11053
